title: N8N REST API Endpoints Not Accessible
description: All N8N REST API endpoints return 404 Not Found, including /rest/credentials and /api/v1/credentials. This suggests the REST API layer isn't properly exposed or configured. N8N shows OAuth callback URL in interface but the underlying REST infrastructure appears non-functional. May require specific N8N configuration or database initialization to enable REST API access.

solution.description: DNS misconfiguration identified as root cause. Domain harrys.standupsydney.com resolves to AWS CloudFront IPs instead of our DigitalOcean server (170.64.129.59). N8N REST API works locally, Nginx config is correct. Solution: Update DNS A record to point to 170.64.129.59 to restore REST API accessibility.
